title: This game is retarded
body:
For that I get a B only. There was literally nothing more I could do to get a higher score, we were sitting under the entrance to their base.

You really need to re-evaluate how the score are given out, not only do premades have a higher chance to get better stats, and therefore a better scorecard, you than factor in games that nothing actually happens and the chances to get SOMETHING other than average is quite impossible at times.

replies.body: You died 5 times, that is all i will say.
